title: Extreme heat challenges around the world
description: Extreme heat has run rampant across several parts of the world in recent weeks. Texas, northern Mexico, India and China are among the areas that have seen some of the most dangerous heat.

title: Lukashenko claims he persuaded Putin not to kill Wagner boss Prigozhin
description: The Belarusian president described his conversations with the Russian president and the mercenary chief in unusually frank comments on Tuesday.

title: On this part of the eastern front, Russia is still on the attack
description: Even as Ukraine mounts a counteroffensive to liberate occupied territory, Russian troops are still pursuing Vladimir Putin's aim of seizing the entire eastern Donbas region.

title: Wagner leader Prigozhin in Belarus is bad news for pretty much everybody
description: The people of Belarus, Ukraine and the European Union are all worried about having the Wagner Group leader based even closer to them.

title: After Putin speech on deal with mercenaries, Russia confronts divisions
description: The Russian president tried on Tuesday to present his military and his country as united. But questions swirled about his decision to leave Wagner mercenaries unpunished.

title: Millions of Muslims head for Hajj pilgrimage as covid restrictions lift
description: Muslims circle the Kaaba in Mecca and head to Mount Arafat as the annual Hajj pilgrimage gets underway, with visitor numbers close to pre-pandemic levels.

title: Man carves love note into Colosseum in latest case of tourist misbehavior
description: An Italian minister called a man carving his fiancee's initials into the Roman landmark "a sign of great incivility." The tourist could be fined $16,400.

title: Is Ireland paying people to move to islands? How those viral deals work.
description: The internet is full of stories about countries effectively paying people to move to remote locations. These programs can work, but there are caveats.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Visibly irate, Putin confirms Wagner fighters killed Russian pilots
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin and Wagner chief Yevgeniy Prigozhin both spoke for the first time since the weekend rebellion against Moscow.

title: Egyptian chefs are revolutionizing their cuisine — one meal at a time
description: Young chefs in Cairo are trying to reinvent the local food culture and expand the Egyptian palate, in part by bringing high-end cooking into customers’ homes.

title: China, in swipe at U.S., accuses West of ‘sowing division and confrontation’
description: China's economy is slowing and unemployment rising as the country struggles to emerge from zero covid policies. Talk of "de-risking" isn't helping either.

title: Putin wanted to redeem Russia’s history. He’s now haunted by it.
description: Russia's president likened the Wagner mutiny to the 1917 crisis that saw the Russian empire slide into the Bolshevik Revolution, appearing to style himself as the flailing, bungling Czar Nicholas II.
